text: Configuration Management is a process for ensuring consistency in your operational environment.
Your governance and compliance set-up will drive the reliability of your cloud implementation,
reducing the chance of unpredictable errors.
And, AWS provides tools to assist.
The AWS Well-Architected Tool enables customers to review their workloads against best practices
With AWS Config you can assess, audit, and evaluate the configurations of your resources
AWS Control Tower makes it easier to set-up
and govern a new, secure, multi-account AWS environment, based on best practices.
And, finally, AWS IAM Access Analyzer
makes it simple to audit resource policies
With these tools, you can track and maintain your Configuration Management
and AWS is here to help.
To learn more, go to aws.amazon.com/security
